description: Tool for computing brain volume statistics with FreeSurfer

subject_id.title: Subject
subject_id.description: The subject ID for which brain volume statistics are computed

xml_string.title: XML String Input
xml_string.description: XML string containing input data. The XML is used to define additional parameters for computation.

no_surface.title: Exclude Surface Calculations
no_surface.description: Flag to specify that surface-based measurements should not be included in the output.

include_segmentation.title: Include Segmentation
include_segmentation.description: Flag to include segmentation information in the brain volume calculations.

output_file.title: Output File
output_file.description: Output file path to write the brain volume statistics.
